definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Vegetation affected tree transpiration of strong, more humid environment.
sentences.chinese: 植被影響樹的蒸騰作用強，使環境更加潮溼。

sentences.english: Most of the remaining 10% is released by plants through transpiration.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的10%主要來自於植物的蒸騰作用。
